Flow.description:
This flow is used to perform operations on creation of Client Contact. Below are the operations performed: 1. Auto submit client contact for DS Approval on client contact creation. 2. Added Client Contact Relationship Team member creation having role "Record Creator". 3. Added Client Contact Relationship Team members creation on "Client Contact" creation. 4. Added "Client Contact Record Type" mapping.
[Suraj Kumar 04-10-2023]: Removed Auto-Submission for DS Team on creation. [Suraj Kumar 18-10-2023]: Added custom error message for all DMLs in fault path.
[Suraj Kumar 05-06-2024] : Replaced record creator user from "Created By User" to "Owner".
Flow.label: Client Contact | Insert Operations

recordCreates.description: Used to create Client Contact Relationship Team member having "Record Creator" role.
